title: Smoking Regius with Akhil & Exposing Cuban Secrets
itunes:title: Smoking Regius with Akhil & Exposing Cuban Secrets
description: We are joined in studio by the world record holder of the most expensive cigar ever sold. He is also a brand owner from across the pond, Akhil Kapacee of Regius Cigars joins us in studio. Also we revisit Cuba with David Garofalo who has been sharing his story in a 6 part series here on The Cigar Authority, and we talk in detail about the secrets of Cuban cigars, that they do not want us to know. It will blow your mind. All that and all the usual hijinks that is The Cigar Authority. ﻿
